title: Scale a Value between Two Ranges
description:
SCALE_D scales an input value DWORD and calculates an output value in
REAL. The input value X is limited here to I_LO and I_HI. SCALE_D (IN, 0,
8191, 0, 100) scales an input with 14 bit resolution to the output 0..100.
SCALE_D can also be negative and have a negative slope work at output
values, and the values I_LO and I_HI must always be specifed that ILO <
I_HI is.
name: SCALE_D

input.name: X
input.description: The input value to be scaled.

input.name: I_LO
input.description: The lower limit of the input range.

input.name: I_HI
input.description: The upper limit of the input range.

input.name: O_LO
input.description: The lower limit of the output range.

input.name: O_HI
input.description: The upper limit of the output range.

output.name: SCALE_D
output.description: The scaled output value based on the input range and output range.

return_value.description: The function returns the scaled value.
